title: math/big. func (x *Rat) Float64() (f float64, exact bool) return wrong data
body:
by **mz3corvinus**: 
Wrong return for big.Rat.SetString("1/10")

Also it present at go playgroung -
http://play.golang.org/p/RkRyqxsi5w

expected output: 0.1 true

I see: 0.1 false

Compiler: 6g

OS: linux amd64

Version: go version devel +9fe43a708b89 Fri Nov 08 15:23:12 2013 -0500 linux/amd64
